TechnologyApr 23, 2025Ray-Ban Meta Glasses coming to India soon: AI, live translation features, music and all the features of the smart glassesMeta's Ray-Ban Meta Glasses, featuring AI, live translation, and more, are launching soon in India, Mexico, and the UAE. These smart glasses, developed with EssilorLuxottica, enable hands-free photo and video capture, open-ear audio, and voice control via "Hey Meta." Users can also enjoy live translation and livestreaming capabilities, enhanced by Meta AI integration for answering questions and assisting with tasks.
